scripts.build: npm run build:acedirect && npm run build:acedirect-kurento && npm run build:acr-cdr && npm run build:aserver && npm run build:fendesk && npm run build:managementportal && npm run build:userver && cat dat/ad.txt
scripts.clean: npm run clean:acedirect && npm run clean:acedirect-kurento && npm run clean:acr-cdr && npm run clean:aserver && npm run clean:fendesk && npm run clean:managementportal && npm run clean:userver
scripts.clean:logs: npm run clean:logs:acedirect && npm run clean:logs:acedirect-kurento && npm run clean:logs:acr-cdr && npm run clean:logs:aserver && npm run clean:logs:fendesk && npm run clean:logs:managementportal && npm run clean:logs:userver
scripts.lint: npm run lint:acedirect && npm run lint:acedirect-kurento && npm run lint:acr-cdr && npm run lint:aserver && npm run lint:fendesk && npm run lint:managementportal && npm run lint:userver
scripts.build:acedirect-kurento: cd acedirect-kurento && rm -rf node_modules && npm install && npm run build
